casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Angela Marie RANKIN 23P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 22, 2018 Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Rankin, Angela Marie. Amy Bircher, Assistant Attorney General, Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of January 2018."
